company_context: Sign Documents Online for Free | Xodo Sign (eversign) 4.8 2k+ reviews 4.8 2k+ reviews Edit and Sign Documents Online in One Secure Platform Xodo Sign (formerly eversign) makes it simple to edit, sign, and send documents online. Get fast, secure electronic signatures and built-in PDF editing tools to manage important contracts - all in one platform. Our platform supports legally binding e-signatures for individuals and teams with no limits. Complete Audit Trails Every signed document is tracked from start to finish with a clear, timestamped audit trail, so you always know who did what and when. Add Your Entire Team Easily invite your team. Assign roles, set permissions, and manage document access for everyone. See all features Add and Edit Text Update contracts or fix typos directly in the document. Insert missing info or tweak the wording without starting over. Redact, Annotate, and Organize Highlight important sections, redact sensitive data, or rearrange pages - all with our built-in PDF editor. Prepare Documents for Signing Drag and drop fields for names, initials, signatures, and more. Make your docs ready to sign in just a few clicks. See all features eSignature API for Custom Workflows Easily integrate advanced e-signatures into your apps with the flexible and secure Xodo Sign API. Learn more Embedded Signing Let users sign documents right inside your app or website. Embedded signing keeps the experience fully branded and seamless with no redirects or interruptions. Automated Workflows Save time by automating repetitive tasks. Connect to CRMs and file storage tools to automatically send, track, and store signed documents, no manual work required. No-Code Integrations Use tools like Zapier and Relay.app to connect the Xodo Sign API to your favorite apps, no coding needed. Build custom workflows in minutes, not days. Embedded Requesting Need someone else to sign? Let users send signature requests from within your platform. Embedded requesting makes it easy to move contracts forward without switching tools. Built for Businesses That Run on Documents Request a Demo Real Estate Send and sign offers, rental agreements, and closing forms fast. Keep deals moving with electronic signatures that work from anywhere. Construction Share bids, safety forms, and contracts with just a few clicks. Get everything signed on time, so your projects stay on track. Legal Keep every document safe, signed, and easily accessible. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their data workflows and gain valuable insights. Can you tell me a bit about your current data management process?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another data solution. We're already using a few different tools to manage our data, and to be honest, I'm not sure we need another one. What makes DeepData AI so special?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism, but what sets us apart is our AI-powered engine that can handle large volumes of data and provide real-time analytics. We've seen our clients reduce their data processing time by up to 70% and increase their decision-making speed by 50%. I'd love to show you a demo and see if it can address any specific pain points you're experiencing.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection) That sounds interesting, but we're in the middle of a big project right now and I don't have the bandwidth to consider new solutions. Plus, I'm not sure if our budget can accommodate another tool. We're trying to cut costs, not add more expenses.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that timing and budget are always concerns. However, I'd like to propose that our solution can actually help you save costs in the long run by automating manual data processes and reducing the need for additional personnel. We've had clients see a significant ROI within the first 6-12 months of implementation. Would you be open to a brief call next week to discuss how DeepData AI can specifically address your current project needs and see if it's a good fit?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection) I'm not sure...we're also considering a few other solutions, including one from a competitor that seems to offer similar features at a lower price point. How do you differentiate yourself from them?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: We've actually done a thorough comparison with our competitors, and while they may offer similar features, our AI engine is much more advanced and can handle complex data sets with ease. Additionally, our customer support team is top-notch and provides dedicated onboarding and training to ensure a smooth transition. I'd be happy to provide a detailed comparison document and answer any questions you may have. But I think it's worth noting that our solution is not just about the features, but also about the value we can bring to your organization in terms of increased efficiency and productivity.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (somewhat convinced) Alright, I'll admit that I'm intrigued. But I still need to discuss this with our team and do some more research. Can you send me some more information and maybe we can schedule a demo for next week?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I'd be happy to send over some case studies and a detailed overview of our solution. And I'd love to schedule a demo at your convenience. How about I send you a calendar invite for next Wednesday at 2 PM?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alright, let's schedule that demo for next Wednesday at 2 PM. I'll make sure to have our team leads join as well, so we can get a better understanding of how DeepData AI can fit into our workflow.

analysis.raw:
Score: 8
Outcome: Success
Key_Objection: Competitors
Feedback: The seller effectively addressed the buyer's objections and concerns, but could have further emphasized the unique value proposition of DeepData AI to more strongly differentiate it from competitors. Sentiment: Positive
